dmca.title: Video Production Product Key Appearing on Google Groups (#3)
dmca.body:
muvee Technologies Pte. Ltd.
[Private]
[Private]
Singapore 189648

tel: [private]
fax: [private]

www.muvee.com
world's only smart automatic video editing
    
22nd January 2003
    
Fax to: [private]
    
Attn: [private], Google
    
Dear Sir or Madam
    
Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement - Reference Google Case ID: [private]
    
1. We sell the product key of our software 'muvee autoProducer 2.1' on our website for US$49.95 which enables the customer to use the full version of our software. One such product key has been published on Google groups, which people are using extensively to get the full version of the software for free. muvee Technologies Pte. Ltd. is the developer of this software and has the exclusive right to license it via Electronic Software download from our website at www.muvee.com.
    
The product key appearing on Google groups is:
    
[redacted]
    
2. The copyright material in (1) appears at
    
Infringing Web Pages: groups.google.com/
    
Search Query: muvee
URL of the pages:
    
http://groups.google.com.sg/groups?hl=en&lr= &ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&selm=3MZx9.2665%24fn6.338258 %40newsread1.prod.itd.earthlink.net

http://groups.goggle.com.sg/groups?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8 &oe=UTF-8&threadm=9hckruke73unc8kkq1qnp5jae9gpr2n28c%404ax.com &mum=10&prev=/groups%3Fq%3Dmuvee%26hl%3Den%26lr%3D%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe %3DUTF-8%26scoring%3Dd%26selm%3D9hckruke73unc8kkq1qnp5 jae9qpr2n28c%25404ax.com%26mum%3D10

Search Query: muvee serial
http://groups.google.com/groups?g=muvee+serial&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&selm=3MZx9.2665%24fn6.338258%40newsread1.prod.itd.earthlink.net&mum=1

Search Query: muvee serial
http://groups.google.com/groups?q=muvee+crack&hl=en&lr= &ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&scoring=d&selm=nWhV9.56 9762%24GR5.362260%40rwcrnsc51.ops.asp.att.net&mum=1

3. Contact information of muvee Technologies:
    
[Private]
Chief Operating Officer
muvee Technologies Pte Ltd
[Private]
[Private]
Singapore 189646
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
Email: [private]
     
4. The newsgroup on which the infringing entry has appeared:
alt.2600.cracks
    
5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
    
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    

Yours truly,


[Private],
Chief Operating Officer,
muvee Technologies Pte Ltd.
